search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Deadline Funnel (deadline-funnel.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official URL for the Deadline Funnel pricing page is: [https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/pricing](https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/pricing).

Blueprints

More Features Available on Create and Scale plans
-------------------------------------------------

Pro features to help creators make an impact.

![Image 17](https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/magnet-icon.svg)

### More Campaigns and Leads

![Image 18](https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/green-check.svg)

Unlimited campaigns and up to 10,000 subscribers for all of your campaigns

![Image 19](https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/green-check.svg)

Unlimited automations, sequences, and lists from your email platform

![Image 20](https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/green-check.svg)

One subscriber for every five Deadline Funnel campaigns = 5 out of 10,000 leads

![Image 21](https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/rocket-icon.svg)

### Portal

![Image 22](https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/green-check.svg)

Display your countdown timer on your site page with a pop-up widget

![Image 23](https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/green-check.svg)

Customize your Portal with different blocks like headline, social proof, call to action and more

![Image 24](https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/green-check.svg)

Display real-time social proof to other site visitors

![Image 25](https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/advanced-customiztion-icon.svg)

### Advanced Customization

![Image 26](https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/green-check.svg)

Customize the floating bar for different pages in your campaign

![Image 27](https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/green-check.svg)

Choose custom colors to match your brand

![Image 28](https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/green-check.svg)

Upload a custom logo or avatar

![Image 29](https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/auto-week-report-icon.svg)

### Automated Weekly Report

![Image 30](https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/green-check.svg)

We’ll email you each week with an automated report about your campaigns

![Image 31](https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/green-check.svg)

Select and change any three campaigns to include in the weekly report

![Image 32](https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/green-check.svg)

View analytics on the subscribers and sales for those campaigns

Integrate with your entire marketing stack
------------------------------------------

Deadline Funnel integrates with the website and email apps that you use in your business. Create amazing offers for your audience on the platforms where you’re already connected.

Frequently Asked Questions:
---------------------------

What's a campaign?

![Image 33](https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/close-faq.svg) ![Image 34](https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/open-faq.svg)

A Deadline Funnel campaign is a specific deadline for an offer. If you are running a "20% off" evergreen offer for your course, that would be one campaign. Or if you're running a live launch with a specific fixed-date deadline, that would be another campaign.

How do you count leads?

![Image 35](https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/close-faq.svg) ![Image 36](https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/open-faq.svg)

When one of your subscribers enters a Deadline Funnel campaign, they are considered a lead. If the same subscriber enters multiple campaigns, they are counted as a lead in each campaign. So one subscriber who entered 5 of your Deadline Funnel campaigns is counted as 5 leads.

Which plan should I choose?

![Image 37](https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/close-faq.svg) ![Image 38](https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/open-faq.svg)

We recommend our Create plan, which unlocks the full functionality of Deadline Funnel and is the most popular of all our plans. It's perfect for creators and business owners who want to create multiple deadlines and expect to bring in over 1,000 leads per month across all their campaigns.

What does "Data History" mean?

![Image 39](https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/close-faq.svg) ![Image 40](https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/open-faq.svg)

On the Start plan, you can see reports for how many people are going through your campaigns for the last 90 days. On the Create and Scale plans, you can view reports going back 6 months. This is just a reporting limit and doesn't affect anything else.

What's the setup process like?

![Image 41](https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/close-faq.svg) ![Image 42](https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/open-faq.svg)

Thanks to our onboarding sequences and helpful blueprints, setting up your Deadline Funnel campaign is both easy and quick. In just minutes you could have your deadline set and Deadline Funnel installed in your website, funnel or email sequence. And we're here to help answer any questions you might have!

What type of support do you offer?

![Image 43](https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/close-faq.svg) ![Image 44](https://www.deadlinefunnel.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/open-faq.svg)

We offer both email and chat support. Have a question? Send a message to help@deadlinefunnel.com anytime.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Annual plans offer a 20% discount compared to monthly billing.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: For new creators testing the waters.
